name: Sprint 1 Deliverable
description:
Sprint 1 Deliverable

This project is about user input. Every time the user clicks the mouse a figure will be displayed. These figures are Sphere, Cube, Cylinder, and Capsule. According to the user's choice of clicking mouse, it will continue drawing or deleting the items. Users have different options when using the application, such as different colors, forms, and the way that items are deleted. With this application, users can create amazing drawings.
